body:
I have been trying to build older versions of LLVM (<12.0.0) with gcc@11.1.0 without any luck. After a while the build fails with some uninformative error messages like these:
```
make[4]: Leaving directory '/tmp/amaji/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-uvcip6bhjaaepvhzej7czkaemhjgz4wb/spack-build-uvcip6b/projects/compiler-rt/lib/fuzzer/libcxx_fuzzer_x86_64-bins'
make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/amaji/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-uvcip6bhjaaepvhzej7czkaemhjgz4wb/spack-build-uvcip6b/projects/compiler-rt/lib/fuzzer/libcxx_fuzzer_x86_64-bins'
make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/amaji/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-uvcip6bhjaaepvhzej7czkaemhjgz4wb/spack-build-uvcip6b'
[ 22%] Built target libcxx_fuzzer_x86_64-build
make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/amaji/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-uvcip6bhjaaepvhzej7czkaemhjgz4wb/spack-build-uvcip6b'
[ 22%] Built target RTAsan.x86_64
make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/amaji/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-uvcip6bhjaaepvhzej7czkaemhjgz4wb/spack-build-uvcip6b'
[ 22%] Built target RTAsan_dynamic.x86_64
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/amaji/spack-stage-llvm-11.1.0-uvcip6bhjaaepvhzej7czkaemhjgz4wb/spack-build-uvcip6b'
make: *** [Makefile:159: all] Error 2
```

I am wondering if anyone else has experienced this. Is LLVM 11 incompatible with gcc@11?

**Note:** 
`llvm@12.0.0%gcc@11.1.0` builds fine.  
`llvm@11.1.0%gcc@8.3.1` builds fine.
title: Installation issue: llvm@11.1.0%gcc@11.1.0 build fails
